body_html:
I'm getting a very similar error that I can't get around. If I add //tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base to the Bazel dependencies, though, I get this error:

tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base cannot depend on tensorflow/core:framework.

It seems both these builds have the other listed in their disallow_deps attribute. I can't find a workaround.

body:
I'm getting a very similar error that I can't get around. If I add //tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base to the Bazel dependencies, though, I get this error:

tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base cannot depend on tensorflow/core:framework.

It seems both these builds have the other listed in their disallow_deps attribute. I can't find a workaround.
